# transferRepresentation

**Type Property**

The representation used to import and export the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@TransferRepresentationBuilder<Self> static var transferRepresentation: Self.Representation { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.CoreTransferable/documentation/CoreTransferable/Transferable/transferRepresentation] can contain multiple representations for different content types.

## Implementing a transfer representation

- **Representation**: The type of the representation used to import and export the item.
